availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Miller (Franklin County, Kentucky, tinner)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, tinner. Kentucky native. Son of William F. Miller and Mahalia Parrant Miller. Married to Octavia Willis Miller in Fayette County, Kentucky, on November 27, 1859. Father of Frank Miller. Tinner in Franklin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 32A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 389.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 151B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994033, Fayette County Marriages.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 8919.
"George W. Miller (Unknown-1912)," Find A Grave, Memorial 122626094, accessed November 21, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/122626094.
